cardContent.title: What is Blockchain?
cardContent.description:
Learn the basics of Blockchain, from cryptography basics to the consensus algorithms.
Why do we need it, how does it work and where to use it?

cardContent.title: Blockchain Tutorials
cardContent.description: These tutorials introduce what blockchain is, how to create a blockchain from scratch, and code examples to help you get started with blockchain programming.

cardContent.title: Frameworks & Libraries
cardContent.description: A collection of various blockchain development tools that you may encounter, including blockchain frameworks, libraries, clients, and more.

cardContent.title: Web 3.0 Platforms
cardContent.description: Here are Web3 services, applications, and projects that you may find helpful when building your own decentralized application.

cardContent.title: Web 3.0 Video Tutorials
cardContent.description: These videos cover introductory topics on Web 3.0 concepts, how to build a blockchain, how to build your own DApp, and more.

cardContent.title: Web 3.0 Podcasts
cardContent.description: Stay up-to-date on the latest insights and opinions from the Web 3.0 experts within the Web 3.0 world with these blockchain podcasts.
